user.description:
Enter the League and Team to create the sensor.

League: NFL, NCAAF, MLB, NBA, WNBA, NCAAM, NCAAW, NCAAVB, NCAAVBW, MLS, NWSL, BUND, CL, CLA, EPL, LIGA, LIG1, SERA, WC, PGA, ATP, WTA, F1, IRL, XFL

Team: 2-4 letter team abreviation used on ESPN's scoreboards and stats pages

Conference Number: For NCAA football and basketball only.  See README.md for valid values.  Leave blank to only include games with ranked teams.

path.title: Custom API Configurator
path.description: Enter the 'sport' and 'league' portion of the ESPN API path to use a self-configured API

init.title: Team Tracker Options
init.description: Enter the 2-character language code to use for the API call.
